articles.author: Emma Brockes
articles.title: Remembering Joan Didion: ‘Her ability to operate outside of herself was unparalleled’ - The Guardian
articles.description: The American author was not only brilliant but also generous and kind to younger writers, writes Emma Brockes
articles.content:

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Singer Wang Leehom's wife says she will not accept house from him - The Star Online
articles.description: TAIPEI (The Straits Times/Asia News Network) Taiwanese-American singer Wang Leehom's divorce saga showed few signs of ebbing as his estranged wife Lee Jinglei posted again on Thursday (Dec 23) to rebut claims against her.

articles.title: A peerless prose stylist: American journalist and author Joan Didion dies at 87 - CBC.ca
articles.description: The revered American writer, whose provocative social commentary made her a critic of a uniquely turbulent time, has died. Didion's publisher announced the author's death on Dec. 23, 2021.
articles.content: Joan Didion, the revered American author and essayist whose precise social and personal commentary in such classics as The White Album, South and West and The Year of Magical Thinking made her a uniq… [+4047 chars]
